item.title: Git tips
item.description: A few tips regarding use of git that I wish I was told back when I started using git seriously. Nothing here is meant to replace reading the amazing git book, just friendly advice. First, miscellaneous tips, and below a recommendations section below is more “opinionated advice”. Most of these tips are meant for Linux. This was originally written for my work colleagues, but I felt some of the recommendations were too close to personal stances, and a document not everybody could get behind was not as useful there.
